code: import i18n from"i18next";import{initReactI18next}from"react-i18next";import translationEn from'./locales/en/lang.json';import translationRu from'./locales/ru/lang.json';var resources={en:{translation:translationEn},ru:{translation:translationRu}};var lang=['en','ru'];i18n.use(initReactI18next).init({resources:resources,lng:"en",whitelist:lang,interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18n;
